snippet.title: 21 Card Games - PlayStation 2 Gameplay
snippet.description:
Pull up a chair and deal yourself in for a collection of 21 of the most popular card games all in one. 21 Card Games has something for everyone--edge of your seat action with poker, luck and skill with blackjack or the relaxation of a round of patience--plus many, many more. Choose from 50 character portraits and select your game among the wide variety available. Gohead to head with the dealer - or play against skilled opponents--21 card games will give everyone from novices to professionals hours of endless fun.

Developed by Mere Mortals
Published by Phoenix Games

#retrogames #retrogaming #playstation2 #ps2 #phoenixgames #21cardgames #cardgames #solitaire #theforeseenarcade 

FUN FACT: As obscure as it is, it had the dubious honor of being the second game to be given a score of 0/10 by the Official PlayStation 2 Magazine, as the game was reviewed on issue 76. The only other game to have that jaw-droppingly low score of 0/10 was a PlayStation 2 compatible DVD game Hologram Time Traveller, which was reviewed on issue 3.
